name: Dragon Rescue Crush
description:
Dragon Rescue Crush is an action game that have to be fast and careful. Split the matching boxes and make dragons fall down, falling down will be freed from captivity. You have to use your intelligence when you're trying to be fast. Make the best score while saving the dragons and share with your friends.

- Mobile optimized HD graphics
- One touch easy played game
- Different funny levels

Enjoy the game completely free!

For all your questions: support@optogames.com
